deity_markdown: [Ardad Lili](/Deities.aspx?ID=588), [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278), [Belial](/Deities.aspx?ID=396), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=279), [Conqueror Worm](/Deities.aspx?ID=234), [Corosbel](/Deities.aspx?ID=418), [Hathor](/Deities.aspx?ID=634), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=313), [Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx)](/Deities.aspx?ID=574), [Ozranvial](/Deities.aspx?ID=599), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=620), [Razmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=357), [Sturovenen](/Deities.aspx?ID=523), [The Green Mother](/Deities.aspx?ID=453), [Ussharassim](/Deities.aspx?ID=531), [Velgaas](/Deities.aspx?ID=601), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=443)
markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 320 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Bloodlines** [Diabolic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=22), [Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=25) **Deities** [Ardad Lili](/Deities.aspx?ID=588), [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278), [Belial](/Deities.aspx?ID=396), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=279), [Conqueror Worm](/Deities.aspx?ID=234), [Corosbel](/Deities.aspx?ID=418), [Hathor](/Deities.aspx?ID=634), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=313), [Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx)](/Deities.aspx?ID=574), [Ozranvial](/Deities.aspx?ID=599), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=620), [Razmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=357), [Sturovenen](/Deities.aspx?ID=523), [The Green Mother](/Deities.aspx?ID=453), [Ussharassim](/Deities.aspx?ID=531), [Velgaas](/Deities.aspx?ID=601), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=443) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** Will **Duration** 1 hour --- To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used [hostile actions](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) against it. You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.
**Success** The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of _charm_, unless it [identifies the spell](/Rules.aspx?ID=2249).
**Failure** The target's attitude becomes [friendly](/Conditions.aspx?ID=18) toward you. If it was friendly, it becomes [helpful](/Conditions.aspx?ID=21). It can't use hostile actions against you.
**Critical Failure** The target's attitude becomes helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you. --- **Heightened (4th)** The duration lasts until your next daily preparations. **Heightened (8th)** The duration lasts until your next daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
name: Charm
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />

<trait label="Subtle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=522" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 320 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Diabolic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=22), [Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=25)

**Deities**
[Ardad Lili](/Deities.aspx?ID=588), [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278), [Belial](/Deities.aspx?ID=396), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=279), [Conqueror Worm](/Deities.aspx?ID=234), [Corosbel](/Deities.aspx?ID=418), [Hathor](/Deities.aspx?ID=634), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=313), [Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx)](/Deities.aspx?ID=574), [Ozranvial](/Deities.aspx?ID=599), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=620), [Razmir](/Deities.aspx?ID=357), [Sturovenen](/Deities.aspx?ID=523), [The Green Mother](/Deities.aspx?ID=453), [Ussharassim](/Deities.aspx?ID=531), [Velgaas](/Deities.aspx?ID=601), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=443)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
A creature becomes more friendly to you.
</summary>
summary: A creature becomes more friendly to you.
summary_markdown: A creature becomes more friendly to you.
text: Charm Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 320 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Bloodlines Diabolic, Fey Deities Ardad Lili, Asmodeus, Belial, Calistria, Conqueror Worm, Corosbel, Hathor, Nalinivati, Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx), Ozranvial, Ravithra, Razmir, Sturovenen, The Green Mother, Ussharassim, Velgaas, Zura Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration 1 hour --- To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it. You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means. Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it. Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm , unless it identifies the spell. Failure The target's attitude becomes friendly toward you. If it was friendly, it becomes helpful. It can't use hostile actions against you. Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you. --- Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until your next daily preparations. Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until your next daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.
